response:
reasoning='The task is to replace the width, length, and multiplier placeholders in the provided OTA netlist template with specific values while ensuring that the resulting design meets the given performance specifications. The specifications include a DC differential-mode gain (AV0) ≥ 40 dB, a unity-gain frequency (fUGF) ≥ 50 MHz, a common-mode rejection ratio (CMRR) ≥ 80 dB, and an input common-mode range (ICMR) that satisfies certain conditions. I will choose the widths, lengths and multipliers that satisfy the requirement.' config=ConfigFile(netlist='// Library name: MP3
// Cell name: ota
// View name: schematic
subckt ota VDD VSS ibp10u vin vip vout
    N3 (ibp10u ibp10u VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=30.015u l=3.015u as=1.35068e-11 
        ad=1.35068e-11 ps=60.93u pd=60.93u m=1 region=sat
    N2 (net7 ibp10u VSS VSS) tsmc18dN w=480.015u l=3.015u as=2.16007e-10 
        ad=2.16007e-10 ps=960.93u pd=960.93u m=1 region=sat
    N5 (vout vin net7 net7) tsmc18dN w=10u l=0.18u as=4.5e-12 ad=4.5e-12 
         ps=20.9u pd=20.9u m=2 region=sat
    N4 (net8 vip net7 net7) tsmc18dN w=10u l=0.18u as=4.5e-12 ad=4.5e-12 
         ps=20.9u pd=20.9u m=2 region=sat
    P1 (net8 net8 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=20u l=0.18u as=9e-12 ad=9e-12 
         ps=40.9u pd=40.9u m=2 region=sat
    P0 (vout net8 VDD VDD) tsmc18dP w=20u l=0.18u as=9e-12 ad=9e-12 
         ps=40.9u pd=40.9u m=2 region=sat
ends ota
// End of subcircuit definition.

// Library name: MP3
// Cell name: dut
// View name: schematic
I16 (net1 net2 net6 net4 net3 net5) ota')
